data.title: Company profile AERZEN CHINA
data.text:
AERZEN China's after-sales service covers a broad geographic scope, encompassing the Chinese Mainland, Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, and other regions. Our dedicated after-sales service team comprises over 30 experienced engineers, all of whom have undergone rigorous and comprehensive training following German standards. They are well-equipped to assist users with equipment debugging, installation, maintenance, repairs, and more.

Currently, AERZEN China's after-sales service network consists of one centralized service center in Shanghai and two service points located in Zhanjiang and Xi'an. The Shanghai Service Center is responsible for equipment maintenance, and repairs throughout China, and serves as a hub for commonly used original factory spare parts. The Zhanjiang service point caters to after-sales service in the South China region, while the Xi'an service point covers the northwest region.

Our commitment is to promptly address user needs, and our after-sales service team pledges to provide a response within 24 hours. You can reach our 24-hour after-sales service hotline in China at 400-113-3323.
